Definitely poor FT% and TO's, but there were many other factors,too.
1) Landry guarding Joe.Johnson.. 2) Jorts and Novak at the 4 and 5..29min 5rbds....no interior presence. 3) Novak getting 2 shots Off in 20minutes.. 4) Bibby guarding Teague..instead of T.D..who can drive to the paint and guard the perimeter better. 5) Not playing Jorts and Jerome out there when we're depleted in the painted area (that's 12 hard fouls and active hands and feet). 6) Not using Tyson enough on the offense... 7) Awful interior defense....Hawks scored 44pts in the paint. 8) Baron playing like an idiot last night...4pts,4dimes,4TO's in 24min 9) J.R 33min 2-10 with 5pts, 3rbds, 0 dimes.....and got Burned repeatedly by W.Green down the stretch.
